content:
Anoying mosquito 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Knock! 
 
 Knock! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Who is there?” 
 
 I ask slepily. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “It is me,” 
 
 a shril voice says. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Who is ‘me’?” 
 
 I ask. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “I told you, 
 
 it is o-n-l-y m-e,” 
 
 the same voice says. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “I don’t know anyone 
 
 caled, ‘o-n-l-y m-e’,” 
 
 I reply. 
 
 
 
 I check that my 
 
 mosquito net is 
 
 tucked in 
 
 around my bed. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Wel, my name 
 
 is Amos.” 
 
 
 
 The voice sounds 
 
 more shil than before. 
 
 It is very close to my ear. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Amos who?” 
 
 I ask as I lok 
 
 under the net. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Amos Quito,” 
 
 the voice finaly says. 
 
 
 
 I fel a bite on my ear. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Ouch!” 
 
 I jump up and 
 
 begin to search. 
 
 
 
 “You wil pay for this!” 
 
 I shout. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Angrily, I get out of bed and 
 
 switch on the light. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I declare war on 
 
 the anoying 
 
 Amos Quito! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12
